text: Futhi ukube bona babeziphathe ngendlela eyala ngayo iTora neVangeli nalokho okwakuthunyelwe phansi kubona okuvela eNkosini yabo ngempela babezothola izabelo ngaphezulu kwabo futhi nangaphansi kwezinyawo zabo, kubona kunomphakathi owenza ngendlela efanele kepha iningi kubona ububi yilokho elikwenzayo
